name: Another Crystal Story
description:
It’s the annual Renaissance Festival, and everyone is preparing for the festivities. As a boy named Harold and his friend Rocko put together the coolest costume, Rocko remembers he has lost his girlfriend’s earrings in the Ominous Woods. There they meet a wise ranger who connects Harold to his ancestry. She has lost a crystal as well. Together they adventure through harsh terrain to find them. They discover a powerful thief has stolen them to conceive a universe. Harold and his allies must travel beyond their continent to find them. Will Harold and Rocko make it back in time for the festival? - An original story by Letter Box Design, a production company. 

Letter Box Theory - https://letterboxtheory.weebly.com/ 

Story Director/Composer - John Tang - https://jgtang.wordpress.com/ 

Art Director - Tim Tang - https://arcade28.com/ 

Composer - Wayne Chisolm - https://rozy1.bandcamp.com/
